text:
Companies like Amazon—which is owned by the wealthiest guy in America—last year paid zero in federal income taxes.

That's less than you paid.

How does that happen?

Why does that happen?

The answer: we have a corrupt political system. That's the simple fact.

I live 50 miles away from the Canadian border. You don't take out your wallet or your credit card when you go to the doctor or the hospital there.

If Canada can provide health care to all its people at half the cost, we can join the rest of the world and pass Medicare for All.

https://twitter.com/jebbush/status/1226313577235197952 http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/EQX4lsjUwAACzCp.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/EQX4lsjUwAACzCp.mp4 QT @JebBush @barstoolsports @Frozone What a burger

The American people will remember last week’s miscarriage of justice by Senate Republicans in Trump's impeachment trial.

But we cannot forget that the true power and potential of our nation resides with the people. Always remember that. https://www.sfchronicle.com/politics/article/Kamala-Harris-calls-Trump-s-impeachment-trial-15032309.php

At least one of us won...congratulations @marshallcurry!! https://twitter.com/AmyKup/status/1226699610422480897 QT @AmyKup N.J. director Marshall Curry, who was nominated last year and directed the Cory booker doc "Street Fight," wins his first #Oscar for short film "The Neighbors' Window." RT @RevDrBarber Whether you agree w/ @BernieSanders or not, don’t get caught up in the lie that democratic socialism is anti-American. MLK was a democratic socialists. The corporate socialism of the Trump admin is the real danger to democracy. https://www.huffpost.com/entry/martin-luther-king-was-a-democratic-socialist_b_9008990

Some people say it doesn’t matter where a campaign gets its money from.

Of course it matters!

We are not funded by billionaires and corporate CEOs. We are fueled by the working class.

RT @ThisWeekABC Elizabeth Warren says big money in politics is why things “don’t get done” in Washington: “Billionaires — they may own more shoes than the rest of us, they own more cars, they may own more houses — but they shouldn’t own a bigger piece of our democracy.” https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/biden-escalates-attacks-buttigieg-hasnt-unify-black-community/story?id=68850498 http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1226519448162570240/img/yPVEdVWvqBfNTlFE.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1226519448162570240/vid/480x270/0FbNM0jLKKGgaMO8.mp4?tag=13

For GOPers who spent this week mocking the poor w/“bootstrap” jokes, why don’t you listen to Ms. Hutchinson’s testimony & give one damn reason why we shouldn’t have an accurate poverty line in this country.

Unless of course you were talking w/o paying attn to the actual hearing. https://twitter.com/ajplus/status/1226243049841295360 QT @ajplus "I've pulled myself up by the bootstraps so many damn times that I ripped them off." 

This single mom works two jobs and has a bachelor's degree. She wants lawmakers to know poverty is not about being lazy. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQC-C9PVUAApNuc.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1225188100609134592/vid/320x320/lJQTw7RSndxSV5OL.mp4?tag=13

Anwar is a photographer who volunteered with his local fire department. The Trump administration deported him—without a chance to see his attorney or say goodbye to his family—to war-torn Yemen, where he fears for his life. We must end this cruelty. https://www.huffpost.com/entry/ice-deported-yemen-man_n_5e333a10c5b611ac94d1be35

Congratulations! What an important message. The beauty of black hair should always be celebrated. https://twitter.com/TheAcademy/status/1226683808285511680 QT @TheAcademy #Oscars Moment: Hair Love wins Best Animated Short Film! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQYOSstVAAAo9a4.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1226683284815400960/vid/480x270/pX6OyUO8klgU1bkT.mp4?tag=13

I believe in democracy, not billionaires owning the system. That is why our campaign is funded by the working people of this country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQNQ_5nWAAAAiTL.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1225895488643268608/vid/480x270/O1bSj3ujCIO_BHzw.mp4?tag=13

I've been winning unwinnable fights my whole life, from fighting to create the CFPB to unseating an incumbent Republican.

Everyone thinks they know what fights are unwinnable, until we get in the fight, persist—and win. That’s what I’m going to do. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQXJwakXYAAnsGC.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1226607321960329221/vid/480x270/gtyD7DD5P5jbHuLS.mp4?tag=13

This moment in history comes to us. You will decide the direction of our country—not for four years, not for eight years—but for generations to come. 

This is our moment to choose hope over fear, courage over cynicism. This is our moment to dream big, fight hard and win. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQWvbjeXkAYE3Jj.jpg

Tragic news that heroic patriots of the Army 7th Special Forces Group based in Crestview, FL lost their lives in Afghanistan in what appears to be an insider attack on an Afghan base. We are all heartbroken for their families, friends & loved ones.

We launched this grassroots movement for big, structural change one year ago today. More than 100,000 selfies, over 200 town halls, and more than one million individual grassroots donors later, this movement keeps growing. Let's dream big, fight hard, and win! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DzEVJamX4AAKJvy.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1094677632472485888/vid/320x320/gREFATYOgPNRsM3U.mp4?tag=9

RT @AMarch4OurLives Whew, @ewarren just covered: 
✅ universal background checks 
✅ intersection of domestic violence and gun violence 
✅ public support of gun safety policies 
✅ NRA-funded senate inaction 

All points we cover in our #PeacePlan🥳 https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1225968587816546305 QT @nowthisnews Warren: 'We have a gun violence problem in America.' Adds that the problem extends beyond mass shootings, into communities of color, incidents of domestic violence, and the U.S. suicide rates. #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQOD4LmX0AAOgUl.jpg

Representation matters. Rooting for Hair Love tonight. 
https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1225848217985744902 QT @NPR With 'Hair Love,' director Matthew Cherry created an animated ode to black hair — and black family. @WBEZReset caught up with Cherry and producer Karen Toliver to learn more about the Oscar-nominated short film. https://www.npr.org/local/309/2020/02/06/802739449/animated-short-hair-love-brings-diverse-storytelling-to-the-oscars?utm_campaign=npr&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social&utm_term=nprnews

Just four years ago, the establishment said our ideas were “too radical.” Now millions of people are standing together in the struggle for justice. Join us in Keene, NH with @twiddlemusic and @Sunflower_Bean: https://www.pscp.tv/w/cRCZmTMyNzU3OTl8MUJSSmpRTlZ3cWpHd-wwU6p7mUDpHKkct7c32hnhBrplCIDrD60LTB-db8tW

The federal minimum wage:

2009: $7.25/hour
2020: $7.25/hour

That’s unconscionable. The House voted to raise the minimum wage to $15 an hour and it’s time the Senate does the same.

@davidwebbshow @RepAOC @NYPDnews @NYPDShea @NYCPBA This is not my district, but our thoughts are with all officers & people impacted by this shooting & the epidemic of gun violence in this country.

Perhaps you would get less mixed up if McConnell stood up to the NRA & passed common-sense gun safety measures to reduce shootings.
RT @evening_son Ta-Nehisi Coates on Gayle. He has the right words for everything. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQXNpRLXUAA9vb9.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQXNpQ5XkAAewRk.jpg
Maybe this is a radical idea, but I believe the government should help working families, not billionaires.

The billionaire class and Wall Street may hate us. That’s fine. We are the strongest campaign against Trump because we stand with the working class of America. Join us live from our Hanover, New Hampshire town hall: https://www.pscp.tv/w/cRBQ_jMyNzU3OTl8MWVhS2JRa1hZVmt4WLF1aZofvLzHt0VyNkOXj6a-f_Lg8vVWM6SXXwMidySy

@nhannahjones It’s wild that this is still a talking point in a country where the electoral college regularly overrides the popular vote in elections, & the entire Senate is designed to overrepresent smaller, less populated areas over populated ones as a check on the House.

Bank executives like former @WellsFargo CEO John Stumpf should face jail time when the banks they lead break the law. With a two-cent #WealthTax, we can make sure that Benjy and every kid in America has free child care, pre-k, a high-quality public education, and universal public two- and four-year public college and technical school. https://www.cnn.com/2020/02/07/politics/warren-baby-wealth-tax/index.html

We can let fear consume us and divide us—or we can find the courage to come together and fight back. Me? I’m fighting back.

Fighting back is an act of patriotism.

Had a fantastic time with the @NHDems at the McIntyre-Shaheen 100 Club Dinner! We face big challenges—but this is our moment in history. @yashar People will be aghast at this take but as someone who worked brunch shifts for years it absolutely brought out the worst tendencies in people. Lucrative shift though!

Abortion rights are human rights.
Abortion rights are economic rights.
And I will never stop fighting to defend those rights.

RT @WithMyWo I did not like the question Gayle posed to Lisa Leslie at all but the reaction has been wild. Ta-Nehisi Coates never misses. This isn’t a call for civility, it’s a call for humanity:

“We did not calmly express our dislike of the question. We were too weak for that.” http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQXXUOIUUAAaVNR.jpg

Jessica Kensky & Patrick Downes are a courageous young couple who both lost legs in the Boston Marathon bombing. With their leadership, we got legislation signed into law to help other survivors of domestic terrorism get treatment they need at military facilities. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DCYxz4kWAAE4kx8.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/875438138335911936/vid/320x180/1opkbw1FjcO6wGVj.mp4

He is an amazing Senator fighting for all Americans citizens. 

I have complete and total confidence in him. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQYAuWbXYAEWFZF.jpg

Thank you to everyone who is out in the cold in New Hampshire to knock on doors for our campaign!

It's not too late to join in and make sure we win here on Tuesday.

Find a bus, carpool, or plan your own trip here: https://berniesanders.com/berniejourney

Like so many other Black women in Congress, I stand on the shoulders of the great Shirley Chisholm. The first Black woman elected to Congress, Shirley was unbought, unbossed, and never afraid to speak the truth. #BlackHistoryMonth
 http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/DP63DmbWkAE1q7T.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/DP63DmbWkAE1q7T.mp4

This week, the Senate put an end to Democrats’ sham #impeachment.

I was proud to vote on behalf of 28 million Texans and all Americans to defend the Constitution, reject Democrats’ Articles of Impeachment, and acquit @realDonaldTrump. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1226522384603238402/pu/img/Lf8tSe51Kd5TMs6w.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1226522384603238402/pu/vid/480x270/7S8NStskhWafEox8.mp4?tag=10

The budget is a statement of values. Once again, the #TrumpBudget makes it painfully clear how little the President values the good health, financial security and well-being of America’s hard-working families. https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/2920-0

My mother was very intentional about raising my sister and me as strong, Black women. She knew how the world would view us and try to treat us—but she had an unparalleled optimism that we would see what was possible, unburdened by what has been. #BHM
https://blavity.com/kamala-harris-how-these-moments-of-black-history-helped-prepare-me-for-who-ive-become

RT @ReproRights ... this issue of abortion, yes it's about personal choice, you bet it is. But it is also a profoundly economic issue." - @ewarren 
#OurRightsOurCourts

Opioid makers flooded America with 100 billion pills from 2006-2014.

130,000 people died due to their greed.

Executives lied about opioids’ addictiveness, pocketing billions in profits.

My Opioid Crisis Accountability and Results Act helps put corporate criminals behind bars.

Our campaign does not do high-dollar fundraisers in wine caves or on Wall Street.

We're the only leading campaign to not have a single billionaire donor. We're funded entirely by grassroots donors.

This is a campaign of, by and for working people. https://www.unionleader.com/opinion/oped-bernie-sanders-our-campaign-is-different/article_d4cb3b18-9825-52d6-bb4b-e2ce26f17c48.html
